main.title: Hi, my name is
main.name: Denis Nikolaenko
main.description: I build responsive websites that blend technology with creativity.

description.first: Hi! My name is Denis. My interest in web development began 4 years ago when I created my first project during my first year of college. Since then, web development has become my true passion, and I enjoy doing it to this day.
description.second: Today, I work in a small team of 4 people, and together we complete freelance projects. I specialize in frontend development, creating modern and user-friendly interfaces.
description.third: Each new project is an opportunity for me to create something unique and useful. By working on various tasks, I apply advanced technologies and best practices to create high-quality and efficient web applications. My passion for web development drives me to make the internet better and more accessible for everyone.

denwa.title: Project Denwa
denwa.description: Denwa - innovative freelance exchange designed to make finding work and performers as convenient and accessible as possible. The platform provides an opportunity to efficiently develop projects of any complexity.

nftjet.title: NFT JET
nftjet.description: NFT JET - marketplace for trading non-fungible tokens (NFTs). The platform provides users with a user-friendly interface for buying, selling and auctioning digital assets such as artworks, collectibles and virtual goods.

description.first: Promptly discuss all aspects of your project.
description.last: - great way to communicate and clarify nuances. Contact me and we'll turn your ideas into reality!
